name: Hidden Object: My Bakeshop 2
description:
My Bakeshop 2 Hidden Object is back with another sweet addicting FREE hidden object game!
My Bakeshop 2 is filled with tons of sweet bakery scenes for continuous hidden object fun. And like mouth-watering icing on the cake, you get to build-up and design your very own bakeshop!

Customers are excited to see you make the cake of their dreams! Earn coins for every satisfied customer. Play hidden object scenes to earn more coins and stars.

Features:
• HOURS of hidden object gameplay!
• USE hints!
• UNLOCK new scenes!
• NO INTERNET CONNECTION REQUIRED to play!
• DESIGN different cake combinations for your customers!
• DECORATE your bakeshop!
• TONS of décor to chose from!
• MULTIPLE ways to look for objects!
• EVEN pick out the wallpaper, floors, and more!
• UNLOCK items with the stars you earn!
• ZOOM feature available!
• Different game modes like silhouette, words and picture!
• PLAY for FREE NOW!
• FIND hundreds of hidden items and objects!
